name: League of Evil 3
description:
Get ready for the GREATEST platformer with the most responsive controls to hit the App Store yet!

The award-winning and critically-acclaimed platformer for iOS is back again! The Agent and his "bad-guy turned good guy" chum are back for more tough as nails platforming with the series that redefined touch screen mobile gaming.

FEATURES
- Over 80 levels across 4 environments
- Sick acrobatics: Jump, flip, wall jump, wall hug, double jump
- Decapitations and gibs
- Video replays using Everyplay
- Replay Ghosts
- Customizable controls
- User selectable costumes.
- GameCenter Leaderboards and Achievements
- iCloud Game Saving
- Hand illustrated graphics and comic book style cutscenes

DEVICE COMPATIBILITY
LoE3 is best run on newer devices and requires iOS 5.0 or later.
